project-basis: C, a text editor, and GCC. Utilizes linked list and structs for history.
project-challenges: I was very unfamiliar with C and low level languages in general, so it was sometimes challenging to implement even basic functionality that I used to take for granted, such as some more advanced string comparison.
project-future-plans: Persistent history, maybe some other cool stuff
project-purpose: Forks and runs commands inside a Unix environment
project-inspiration: Enhanced an idea from a school project
project-lessons-learned: C, unix commands that I never would have used otherwise
project-accomplishments: I haven't had a segmentation fault in a very long time when running (those were very common in debugging and took a while to hunt down)
project-subtitle: An interactive shell for Linux that I built with C
